import{useEffect}from'react';import{useReccContext}from'../hooks/useReccContext';//components
import ReccDetails from'../components/ReccDetails';import ReccForm from'../components/ReccForm';import SearchBar from'../components/SearchBar';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const{filteredReccArray,dispatch}=useReccContext();useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const data=await fetch("/api/reccs/");const jsonData=await data.json();if(data.ok){dispatch({type:'SET_RECCS',payload:jsonData});}};fetchData();},[dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReccForm,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"reccs",children:filteredReccArray&&filteredReccArray.map(recc=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReccDetails,{recc:recc},recc._id))})]});};export default Home;
